appDesc.message: Capture FULL page screenshots. Edit and save screenshots. Record screencasts - record video from your screen. Record how-to guides.

popupVideoLimitMessage.message: 5 minute limit per video. Upgrade for unlimited recording and other premium features.

popupRecordTypeTitle.message: What do you want to record

popupAutoDeleteDrawingDescription.message: You can specify a time period after which the figures drawn will be deleted while recording a video

popupRecordWantTitle.message: How do you want to record

popupAccessMic.message: For starters, you have to allow access to your microphone

popupReadManual.message: Also, you can read the instructions for using the application

popupVideoReEncodingTitle.message: This option adjusts timeline length. If you turn this option off, video processing (when you stop recording) will be much faster for slow computers but in some cases, timeline scroll will not work. (Recommended for slow computers or Chrome Books)

popupErrorLocalFileMessage.message: Please go to your Chrome extension settings and enable 'Allow access to file URLs', so the extension can access this page.

popupVideoEditorWelcomeDescription.message: Here, you can easily crop and trim your videos. Read the user guide to learn how to work with the editor.

popupVideoEditorCrop.message: Select region you want to crop and hit on check mark.

popupVideoErrorConvert.message: An error occurred. Please try again.

popupVideoGifNotSupport.message: This action is not supported for GIF files.

popupVideoEditorTrim.message: Using the blue markers, select a part of the video that needs to be trimmed and click on Remove selected.

popupAutomationWelcome.message: We are pleased to announce that we added a new feature to record and insert videos directly to Github tickets.

popupAutomationUploadStream.message: A little patience... We are processing your stream video to Nimbus.

popupAutomationStorageLimit.message: There is only a small amount of free space on the disk. We don't guarantee a stable video recording. Please free up your disk space and click Continue recording. Click Stop if you want to finish recording.

popupAutomationGuideError.message: Sorry, the recording server is currently unavailable.

popupAutomationStreamError.message: Sorry, the recording server is currently unavailable. Please try again later or use a local recording.

popupLabelQuickVideoCaptureEnable.message: If the feature is active, you can record and save a video in two mouse clicks the first to start the recording, and the second to stop and save the video. It's really simple!

popupLabelVideoStorageLimit.message: The video recording is stopped if there is less than 500 MB of free space on the disk. Recommended for Chromebook.

popupLabelQuickVideoCaptureGithubEnable.message: Recording a video in Github is very simple! With the first click, you begin recording the page, and with the second one, you add it right to the Github ticket!

popupLabelAnalyticsEnable.message: If actively, anonymous statistics on the use of product functionality are sent to Nimbus.

popupActionMessageCrop.message: Holding down the mouse button, select the desired fragment. Next, save it or send to the editor.

popupActionMessageFragmentScroll.message: Select the desired fragment and click on it. Next, save it or send to the editor.

popupYoutubeChannel.message: You need to a Youtube channel

popupYoutubeChannelCreates.message: In order to upload a recorded videos to Youtube, you will need to create a Youtube channel.

optionLabelEnableWatermarkTimer.message: Hide watermark on the video after

optionsLabelSaveCropPosition.message: Save the position of the selected area

optionsLabelQuickCaptureEnable.message: Enable quick screenshot (without opening the menu)

optionsLabelQuickVideoCaptureEnable.message: Enable quick recording (record video menu will be always shown first)

optionsLabelVideoStorageLimit.message: Stop video recording if there is no space on the disk

optionsLabelAnalyticsEnable.message: Send anonymous usege statistics to Nimbus

optionSelectGithubSendNimbus.message: Send to Nimbus after in Github

labelCaptureHelper.message: Select one of the screens to Snap!

tooltipPassInfo.message: Password must be at least 8 symbols

notificationCrop.message: Drag and Capture Page (Press Esc to Exit)

notificationCopy.message: Image has been copied to the clipboard.

notificationLoginFail.message: Incorrect login or password. Please try again

notificationRestoreSent.message: Restore instructions have been sent to your E-mail.

notificationUrlCopied.message: URL has been copied to the clipboard

notificationReachedLimit.message: You have reached your monthly traffic limit (100 MB). To continue, you have to purchase Nimbus Pro.

notificationNetworkError.message: Problem with server or your Internet-connection. Please try again.

notificationErrorActiveTab.message: Nimble capture can't start the recording while it's being initialized. To activate the extension you need to click on the Nimble capture icon on the panel.

notificationErrorChromeTab.message: Recording of the Internal Chrome pages or App's pages is currently not supported.

notificationDesktopTabSound.message: System sound is not available in Desktop Recording Mode. Use Tab Record instead.

notificationDesktopDrawingTools.message: Drawing tools is not available in Desktop Recording Mode. Use Tab Record instead.

notificationDesktopVideoCamera.message: Video camera is not available in Desktop Recording Mode. Use Tab Record instead.

nimbusSlackWelcome2.message: Nimble Screenshot will not have access to the messages in chat rooms. All your conversations will remain private. Nimble Screenshot can only upload screenshots in Slack

nimbusSlackWelcome3.message: If you have any questions, please write on email

nimbusRate.message: Like Nimble Screenshot? Put it a rating!

nimbusLimitSpace.message: You can't upload this file because you have almost reached your monthly data limit of 100 MB.

nimbusLimitDescription.message: You can switch to Nimbus Pro to increase your monthly data limit to 1 GB.

nimbusLimitVideoOrgFree.message: This video is too large! But it is not lost...

nimbusLimitVideoDestructionOrgFree.message: File exceeds the maximum allowed size for a free account (10 MB). Contact workspace owner for more details.

nimbusLimitVideoOrgPremium.message: This video is too large! But it is not lost...

nimbusLimitVideoDestructionOrgPremium.message: File exceeds the maximum allowed size for a account (1GB). Contact workspace owner for more details.

nimbusLimitVideoOrgLimit.message: This video is too large! But it is not lost...

nimbusLimitVideoDestructionOrgLimit.message: The file will not be saved to FuseBase because the monthly traffic limit (100MB) has been reached. Upgrade to a premium plan to increase your limit.

nimbusLimitVideo.message: This video is too large! But it is not lost...

nimbusLimitVideoDurationDestruction.message: Your 7-day trial has started. You can now record video without a limit on size. After the trial is over, you can record video with a duration of no more than 5 minutes. Upgrade to Nimbus Pro to activate unlimited recording.

nimbusLimitVideoDestruction.message: Max.file size for Nimbus Pro = 1GB Please write to team@nimbusweb.co to raise the file limit.

nimbusLimitVideoFree.message: This video is too large! But it is not lost...

nimbusLimitVideoDestructionFree.message: Max. file size for free accounts = 10MB Upgrade to Nimbus Pro to raise the file limit.

nimbusLimitVideoDestructionStreamTime.message: Important! In the Free plan, you can record a video up to 5 minutes long. Upgrade to Nimbus Pro to record longer videos.

nimbusLimitVideoDestructionStreamMonth.message: In the free plan, you can record no more than 60 videos per month. Go to the Nimbus Pro plan to remove the restriction.

nimbusStreamTitle.message: Speed is the main advantage of using a screen recorder in streaming/instant mode. The moment you stop recording, the video is already on the server and you don't need to wait for the upload to complete.

nimbusStreamDestruction.message: To use streaming/instant mode, you need to have a FuseBase account.

nimbusStreamStartTitle.message:
Thank you for registering.
To start recording, simply click on Start Instant Record.

nimbusStreamStartDestruction.message: Nimble capture will need access to your mic and camera in order to record video that’s one time permission.

nimbusFragmentScrollTitle.message: With this mode, you can take a screenshot of separate fragments with in-page scrolling. For example, it could be a chat window, a service control panel or a task window in Jira. Our app will auto-detect such areas, at which point you will be able to select the one you need.

nimbusShareFriends.message: Send screenshots and screencasts to friends and colleagues;

nimbusAccessAnyTimes.message: Access the screenshots and screencasts at any time and from any device;

nimbusOrganizeUploadFolders.message: Organize your uploads by folders, subfolders, and tags;

nimbusProSendGoogleDrive.message: Upload images and videos to Google Drive

nimbusProSendGoogleDrive2.message: Upload as a public or private link to Google Drive

nimbusProSendDropbox.message: Send images and videos to Dropbox

nimbusLimitDeviceTitle.message: Your Nimble capture account is already being used on the maximum number of devices.

nimbusLimitDeviceDestruction.message: If you want to use Nimble capture on more than two devices, you will need to upgrade your plan.

nimbusBannedDeviceDestruction.message: This device was banned by you.

nimbusEnvironmentInfo.message: Add information about system and page

nimbusNotAccount.message: I do not have an account

newReleaseTitle.message: Welcome to new version of Nimble Screenshot

newReleaseText.message:
• New design;
  • A lock that prevents elements from being edited;
  • Delayed screenshot;
  • Possibility to customize the main menu removing the unnecessary;
  • Possibility to deliberately add numbers next to the needed shapes;
  • Possibility to quickly send to Nimbus/Slack from the editor using the Ctrl+Enter hotkey;
  • Fixed some other bugs;

rateText.message:
Like Nimble capture?
Please write your review! Thank you.

gDriveLabel.message: Select folder you want to save screenshot

gDriveNotAuthorized.message: You are not logged in to your account

videoConvertInfo.message: It might take some time to convert your video to MP4 or GIF format. You`ll be able to save your video as soon as the conversion is finished.

popupTextTrialScreenshot.message: Your trial for taking screenshots of the entire page or page fragments has started. After the trial ends, you will not be able to take a screenshot in Full Page or Selected and Scroll mode in a free account. Upgrade to Nimbus Pro for unlimited screenshots.

labelFileChangeShare.message: If the checkbox is enabled, then a public link will not be created.

popupCnameFreeDesc.message: Add your Custom Domain (CNAME) to your shares. On top of that, you can:

popupCnameFreeDescList1.message: Attach files, links, and more to your screenshots and video

popupCnameFreeDescList2.message: Organize your uploads with workspaces & folders

popupCnameFreeDescList3.message: Create wikis for your teams & clients

popupCnameFreeDescList4.message: Secure your shared pages with passwords (optional)

popupCnameFreeDescList5.message: Promote your brand with our White-label solution

popupCnameFreeDescList6.message: Connect your favorite marketing and analytics tools

welcomeProtectYourQuick.message: Protect your quick links with passwords

welcomeNeedYourVideo.message: Need your video capture order and screenshot tool to be ready at hand?

welcomePleaseClickIcon.message: Please click the jigsaw icon, find Nimbus in the list and click Pin. Our short GIF on the right will help you.

welcomeNimbusNotePromo.message: Your digital headquarters for managing and sharing information

welcomeNimbusCapturePromo.message: Video capture order and screenshot solution for everyday use
